greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into non-triangular numbers, cf. A014132.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^(k*(k+1)/2))/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 30 2016
a(n) ~ sqrt(2) * exp(Pi*sqrt(2*n/3) - Zeta(3/2) * (3*n/2)^(1/4) - 3*Zeta(3/2)^2 / (16*Pi)) / sqrt(n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 01 2017
maple: b(n, i-1)+`if`(i>n or issqr(8*i+1), 0, b(n-i, i))))
mathematica: t = Table[n (n + 1)/2, {n, 1, 200}] ; p[n_] := IntegerPartitions[n, All, Complement[Range@n, t]]; Table[p[n], {n, 0, 12}] (*shows partitions*)

b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, b[n, i - 1] + If[i > n || IntegerQ @ Sqrt[8*i + 1], 0, b[n - i, i]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 60}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 29 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
program: p ks'@(k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks' (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 25 2013
